Package lab2.alg

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
lab2.alg.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Utility class for the Problem and Solution classes, created specifically for code cleanliness and decluttering of aforementioned classes.

  • Method Details

    • getRandSize

      public static int getRandSize()
      Calculates a random size from the sizeList array.
      Returns:
      random int in {30, 100, 150}

    • getRandTime

      public static int getRandTime()
      Calculates a random time from the timeList array.
      Returns:
      random int in {8, 10, 12, 14, 16}

    • getRandTime

      public static int getRandTime(int initTime)
      Overload of getRandTime(); calculates a random duration and adds it to initTime
      Parameters:
      initTime - the start time that needs to be added to
      Returns:
      random int in {8 + 2/4/6, 10 + 2/4/6, 12 + 2/4/6, 14 + 2/4/6, 16 + 2/4/6}

    • getRandOS

      public static String getRandOS()
      Calculates a random OS from the OSList array.
      Returns:
      random String in {"Windows", "MacOS", "Linux", "FreeBSD"}

    • getRandDecision

      public static boolean getRandDecision()
      Calculates a random decision from the projectorDecision array.
      Returns:
      random boolean value in {true, false}

    • rangesOverlap

      public static boolean rangesOverlap(int firstStart, int firstEnd, int secondStart, int secondEnd)
      Checks if two ranges overlap by verifying if the start of the first event is before the end of the second event, and vice-versa.
      Parameters:
      firstStart - lower bound of first range (start of the first event)
      firstEnd - upper bound of first range (end of the first event)
      secondStart - lower bound of second range (start of the second event)
      secondEnd - upper bound of second range (end of the second event)
      Returns:
      true if the ranges overlap, false otherwise

    • sortLists

      public static void sortLists(List<Event> eventList, List<Room> roomList)
      Sorts eventList by size and endTime ascending, and roomList by capacity ascending.
      Parameters:
      eventList - list of events to be sorted
      roomList - list of rooms to be sorted
